Permissive.definition: based on or having permission [ occupancy] [a user of the vehicle] 2

1.definition: based on or having permission [ occupancy] [a user of the vehicle]

2.definition: granting permission or discretion (as to the court) [a statute]

sub_terms.a: allowed or made under a standard, rule, or provision that permits discretion or an option see alsoatatcompare
sub_terms.b: allowed under modern rules of civil procedure although not arising from the same transaction or occurrence as the one at issue in the original claim [a counterclaim] see alsoat
